text: FK IM Rakovica (Serbian Cyrillic: ФК ИМ Раковица) is a professional football club based in Rakovica, Belgrade, Serbia. The club currently playing in the Serbian League Belgrade. During Yugoslav period the club was strongly backed by the IMR factory.Treneri kroz istoriju at FK IM Rakovica official website (claim at Marko Valok section), retrieved 2-6-2018 ==Coaches== IM Rakovica saw a number of notable coaches working in the club, namely: Petar Bugarčić, Milovan Milošević, Ratko Antonović, Ljuba Đorđević, Zvonko Vujić, Slobodan Babanović, Živojin Spasojević, Branko Krajovan, Ljuba Konstadinović, Marko Valok, Andrija Pflander, Velimir Đorđević, Sreten Begovac, Mihajlo Jolić, Ljuba Alimpić, Svetislav Marković, etc. ==References== ==External links== * Official website * FK IM Rakovica at Srbijafudbal Category:Football clubs in Serbia Category:Association football clubs established in 1937 Category:1937 establishments in Serbia Category:Rakovica, Belgrade
title: FK Rakovica
